job description:
Job Number: R0030563

Data Architect, Senior

Key Role:

Build out and manage the roadmaps and architectures for data analytic solutions for clients to revolutionize the way they operate. Combine engineering expertise with innovation and vision to deliver robust solutions that serves clients and stands apart from competitors. Work across a multi-disciplinary team of analysts, data scientists, developers, and users to comprehend the data requirements to develop robust enterprise data architectures that will ingest, manipulate, normalize, store, and expose potentially billions of records per day to support advanced analytics.

Basic Qualifications:

-10+ years of experience with designing and developing data management solutions

-Ability to quickly learn technical concepts and communicate with multiple functional groups

-TS/SCI clearance

-BA or BS degree

-Security+ Certification

Additional Qualifications:

-Experience with DAMA DMBOK, CMMI DMM, or other data governance methodologies

-Experience with Agile software development

-Possession of excellent analytical and problem-solving skills

-Possession of excellent oral and written communication skills

-MA or MS degree

-Certified Cloud Architect

Clearance:

Applicants selected will be subject to a security investigation and may need to meet eligibility requirements for access to classified information; TS/SCI clearance is required.
